title: ornn running animation?

embed.description: Welcome to the Ornn Champion Spotlight. Ornn Reveal http://na.leagueoflegends.com/featured/champion-reveal-ornn The Lost Tales of Ornn http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/tales-of-ornn/ Ornn Story: The Voice from the Hearth http://Universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/ornn-color-story/

body:
might not be in the right place to put this but either way.
when i was looking at the Spotlight video u can see at 4:09 minutes into the video ornn casting righteous glory and that his running animation switches to ornn holding his hammer above his head when charging at the blitzcrank. then after the channel of righteous glory is done his animation swaps back to normal.

but any of the live gameplay i have yet to see this animation be used.
is this a bug or did they get rid of it before he went live?
because in my oppinion it looks cool/funny to see him run like that.

replies.body:
We film the spotlight way before we finalize everything on a champion, so this animation might have been cut. However, I am poking the lead QA on Ornn to double check with him.

Edit: It was axed
